title: Box<dyn* Trait> to Box<dyn Trait> ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(dyn_star)] fn main() { let x: dyn* Send = &(); Box::new(x) as Box; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0-nightly (659e169d3 2023-01-04) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `DynStar`, right: `Dyn`', /rustc/659e169d37990b9c730a59a96081f2ef7afbe8f1/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/base.rs:156:13 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f55bf4af31a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h7b93dcf5d2bf5d8f at /rustc/659e169d37990b9c730a59a96081f2ef7afbe8f1/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f55bf4af31a -
